vsParam:
Er... So the next assignment is killing
the monster and drafting a report...

Just do as usual! With [px] and Escha,
we don't have to worry about the monster!

Hmm!? Ah, no problem, I think!
I am used to the monsters here!
Uh... No, no, I am not!

If you are worried, we can do it together!
Right, Escha?

Thank you, Peppermint.
With everyone here, the monster is not match for us!

... But, this report, I have to write it myself.
Report... *Boo-hoo*...

Alright, let's go kill the monster first before you get
to the report. Let's go!

Let me see... That one should be the monster indicated
in the assignment. Yes, clear features, it should be easy!

Okay, let's kill it!
Don't get hurt, guys!

Alright, the monster is down!
You better draft the report while your memory's still fresh!

Ah, er. That's right!
Okay then~ I'll work hard on the report!

Ah, [px]. You have finished? Let me see it!
... Oh, your structure is quite clear.

How about Escha?
Feel free to ask if you have any problems...

W, what to do now?
I'll miss the deadline...

Er, Escha,
don't tell me you were worried about this...

... Yes.
I am really bad at this kind of works...

I am shocked... I thought civil servants
mainly deal with documents...

Boo-hoo... I had to rewrite my documents very often
after they were returned due to nonconformance at work...

Uh... Out of curiosity, did you have a writing test
when you took part in the civil servant exam?

Er... My situation was a bit special. Before I was employed,
I often helped others' works with alchemy.

So they approved my alchemy capability,
and recruited me directly.
Oh... You can become a civil servant like that!

So, if [px] helps people from all walks of life,
[px] can get a job easily in the future, right?

... Let me think. Only being good at alchemy is not enough,
you must improve your skills in writing reports!

Boo-hoo!
That's right, I am not good at writing, you happy?

Ha ha! Sorry, I am just joking.
At least Escha's alchemy works every time.

Besides, everyone is bad at something.
But... Let's finish this report first, okay?

Oh no!
Who, who can... help me!

Let's see...
We shall start modifying from here.

Hehe. There's a trick in report-writing.
Once you master the trick, all you need to do is practice.

For example, draft an outline of your contents,
this can avoid omissions...

And use charts to present contents that
are hard to be presented in words...

With Anis' guidance, we can relax!
Good luck, Escha!

Okay, thank you!
Great~ We are about to finish!
